sent.orig: The word 'pub' stands for 'public house' and that's exactly what the local pub is.
sent.trans: 单词“pub”代表着“publichouse”（公共场所），而这正是本地酒馆的内涵所在。

sent.orig: I want to go to a Japanese - style pub and unwind a little.
sent.trans: 我想去日式大众酒馆(pub)喝点酒。

sent.orig: The literature was searched using Medline (Ovid) and Pub-Med for original studies.
sent.trans: 运用Medline(Ovid)和Pub-Med数据库查找原始文献。

sent.orig: We picked up a couple of girls at the pub last Friday.
sent.trans: 上星期五我们在酒吧结识了几个女孩。

sent.orig: After starting a fight, he was bounced from the pub.
sent.trans: 在打架闹事后，他被酒廊逐出来。
